Package org.hypergraphdb.viewer.layout

Interface Summary
Layout Interface for every layout algorithm that wish to be applied onto GraphView
 

Class Summary
GEM Java implementation of the gem 2D layout.
HierarchicalLayout Lays out graph in tree-like pattern.
LayoutAction Action that calls specific layout on the current GraphView
Radial
Radial Layout
The layout computePositions method follows the algorithm as given by Eades in his paper "Drawing Free Trees", Bulletin of the Institute for Combinatorics and its Applications, vol.
SpringEmbeddedLayout An implementation of Kamada and Kawai's spring embedded layout algorithm.
SpringLayout
